casebody.data:
In the Matter of G. L. MILLER & CO., Inc., Bankrupt. Claim of John HARRINGTON. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 4, 1929. No. 168. Samuel J. Rosensohn, of New York City, for appellant. . Goldmark, Bennitt & Colin, .of New York City (Godfrey Goldmark, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
